subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Michael Bradley scored in the 107th minute, and the United States rallied past Uruguay, 2-1, last night to advance to the quarterfinals of the FIFA Under-20 World Cup in Toronto.
snippet: Michael Bradley scored in the 107th minute, and the United States rallied past Uruguay, 2-1, last night to advance to the quarterfinals of the FIFA Under-20 World Cup in Toronto.
